Member Function Documentation

static int Motion::accel_intr_enable ( uint8_t  enable,
uint8_t  select = 0,
bool  open_drain = true,
bool  active_high = true,
uint8_t  wake = 0 
)
static
Parameters
enableSpecifies which interrupts to enable e.g. (ITNR_PL)
selectIf bit is set, interrupt is INT1 else interrupt is INT2 e.g. (ITNR_PL | INTR_PULSE)
open_drainInterrupt is an open-drain if true and push-pull if false
active_highInterrupt is active high if true and active low if false
wakeSpecifies which interrupts can wake the device from sleep e.g. (INTR_WAKE_PL)
static int Motion::accel_orient_enable ( uint8_t  enable = 1,
uint8_t  threshold = 0,
uint8_t  hyst = 4,
uint8_t  count = 128,
uint8_t  back_front_trip_angle = 0,
uint8_t  zlock = 0 
)
static
Parameters
thresholdportrait to landscape trip threshold (5 bits)
hystportrait to landscape hysteresis (3 bits)
countdebounce counter (8 bits)
back_front_trip_angleback front trip angle (2 bits)
zlockZ lock angle fixed threshold (3 bits)
static int Motion::accel_pulse_enable ( uint8_t  enable,
uint8_t  threshold_x = 32,
uint8_t  threshold_y = 32,
uint8_t  threshold_z = 32,
uint8_t  limit = 100,
uint8_t  latency = 80,
uint8_t  window = 1 
)
static
Parameters
enableWhich pulses to enable e.g.: (PULSE_X_SINGLE | PULSE_Y_SINGLE)
threshold_x1 to 127 (7 bits)
threshold_y1 to 127 (7 bits)
threshold_z1 to 127 (7 bits)
limitpulse time limit
latencypulse latency window (pulses ignored in this time)
windowTime window between first pulse and second pulse
